column5: Our spacious, light-filled apt. fills the 2nd floor of our tree-surrounded home in Houston's hip and popular Montrose neighborhood. Although serene, some of the BEST restaurants and shopping in Houston are just around the corner. Walk to area hotspots + park your car in our private, off-street parking! Relax on the screened porch + sleep comfortably in the bedroom (large enough to include a banker's desk + piano, in addition to the king bed + b/o drapes).
